page.title: 06ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: OPPORTUNITIES FOR LEISURE PURSUITS ARE DOMINATED BY THE COUNTRYSIDE, RAMBLING, TREKKING AND SKIING ON THE DRY SKI SLOPE ARE ENJOYED BY MANY VISITORS TO THE AREA. THE TREKKING CENTRE HAS PROVISION FOR TENTS AND CARAVANS TO ACCOMODATE THEIR CLIENTS. RESIDENTS ENJOY FISHING IN THE BROOK OR WALKING IN THE FORESTRY. THE LOCAL PUBLIC HOUSE PROVIDES A MEETING PLACE FOR VISITORS,VILLAGERS AND FARMERS. THE CHILDREN HAVE A DANCE STUDIO WHERE THEY CAN LEARN BALLET AND TAP DANCING. THE VILLAGE HALL GIVES OPPORTUNITY FOR DANCES, WHIST DRIVES AND COFFEE EVENINGS AS WELL AS A YOUTH CLUB. THE OVERWHELMING LEISURE TIME PURSUIT IS THE TELEVISION ALTHOUGH THE GARDENS SHOW EVIDENCE OF MUCH TIME SPENT ON THEM. A LIBRARY VAN VISITS FORTNIGHTLY AND A W.I. GROUP MEETS IN THE NEXT VILLAGE. A GUN CLUB IS POPULAR TOO.
